attributes.action: *FREE CANCER SCREENING* on a 6 monthly basis for all UK residents
attributes.additional_details:
On 4th February 2015 i was shocked to see how many of my Facebook friends' had shared  the picture saying "February 4th, is World Cancer Day. I light this candle in honour of all cancer survivors, fighters and those who have lost their life to cancer. Share this to show your support"  I'm sure many people know the image I'm talking about. And yet how sad, that we have 'World Cancer Day' as if its something great like Christmas or New Year...when really Cancer is the one thing that can single handedly ruin so many of our lives.
Full body Cancer screening should be available on perhaps a 6/12monthly basis for EVERYONE. We shouldn't have to live on edge looking out for the signs and symptoms of cancer, we should be looking for ways to catch it early and stop it in its tracks!
It takes just 2 minutes to sign this petition...
Together we WILL beat cancer!

rejection.details: The provision of cancer services and screening programmes is a matter for NHS England, and based on clinical evidence.  Neither the Department of Health nor the Government plays any part in these decisions.
